summary: The customer contacted Contoso Wireless to inquire about upgrading their internet service. The customer service agent provided information about the company's SuperSurf Plus package, which offers up to 200 Mbps download speed, 10 Mbps upload speed, unlimited data cap, and advanced parental control options. The customer was pleased with the package and proceeded to provide the necessary information in order to start the upgrade process. The customer service agent also offered further assistance if needed.
